data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pekarsky, Oleg (2016): Taxonomic notes on the Lygephila vulcanea (Butler, 1881) species-group (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Toxocampinae). Zootaxa 4121 (1): 95-100, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4121.1.10
